「五本书」第四辑：历史的脚注

June 20, 2021

Whereof what’s past is prologue, what to come
In yours and my discharge.

—The Tempest : II.i.253–4

#跳至书单   #跳至书评

本辑书单

Considérations sur les causes de la grandeur des Romains et de leur décadence

 Montesquieu

初版  1734    Jacques Desbordes
英译  Reflections on the Causes of the Rise and Fall of the Roman Empire  (1825);  Considerations on the Causes of the Grandeur and Decadence of the Romans  (trans. Jehu Baker, 1882);  Considerations on the Causes of the Greatness of the Romans and Their Decline  (trans. David Lowenthal, 1965)


Historische Fragmente aus dem Nachlass gesammelt

 Jacob Burckhardt

原稿  1865–1885
初版  1929    Deutsche Verlags-Anstalt
英译  Judgements on History and Historians  (trans. Harry Zohn, 1958)


Inventaires du communisme

 François Furet

原稿  1996–1997
初版  2012    Éditions de l’EHESS
英译  Lies, Passions, and Illusions: The Democratic Imagination in the Twentieth Century  (trans. Deborah Furet, 2014)
